quiz.pack.title: Quiz on Distance Preserving Linear Transformations

para.para.body: Does a shear transformation of the plane preserve distances?
In the picture above, consider the effect of shearing on the vector \StdBss{2}
A shear transformation is distance preserving.
Sorry! No.
A shear transformation is not distance preserving.
Does the dilation transformation below preserve distances?
Yes! D preserves distances
Sorry! No!
No! D does not preserve distances
Correct! – D increases the distance between any two points by a factor of 3 . Therefore D does not preserve distances.
Does a reflection of \RNr[3] about a plane passing through the origin preserve distances?
Yes! This reflection preserves distances.
Correct!
No! This reflection does not preserve distances.
Sorry! No!
Does a projection of the plane \RNr[2] onto a line through the origin preserve distances?
Yes, such a projection preserves distances
Sorry! No!
No, such a projection does not preserve distances
